com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3

Class ActivityMviDelegateImpl<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.ActivityMviDelegateImpl<V,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of MvpView
    P - The type of MvpPresenter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityMviDelegate

    public class ActivityMviDelegateImpl<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActivityMviDelegate
    The concrete implementation of ActivityMviDelegate. This delegate creates the Presenter and attaches the View to the presenter in Activity#onStart(). The view is detached from presenter in Activity#onStop()
    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    ActivityMviDelegate

      ActivityMviDelegateImpl(Activity activity, MviDelegateCallback<V,P> delegateCallback)
      Creates a new Delegate with an presenter that survives screen orientation changes
      ActivityMviDelegateImpl(Activity activity, MviDelegateCallback<V,P> delegateCallback, boolean keepPresenterInstance)
      Creates a new delegate

      • ActivityMviDelegateImpl

        public ActivityMviDelegateImpl(Activity activity,
                               MviDelegateCallback<V,P> delegateCallback)
        Creates a new Delegate with an presenter that survives screen orientation changes
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity
        delegateCallback - The delegate callback

      • ActivityMviDelegateImpl

        public ActivityMviDelegateImpl(Activity activity,
                               MviDelegateCallback<V,P> delegateCallback,
                               boolean keepPresenterInstance)
        Creates a new delegate
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity
        delegateCallback - The delegate callback
        keepPresenterInstance - true, if the presenter instance should be kept through screen orientation changes, false if not (a new presenter instance will be created every time you rotate your device)
